name: Card Token Systems

request.description:
## Request

- **Method**: `GET`
    
- **URL**: `{{accountName}}.vtexcommercestable.com.br/api/payments/pvt/accounts/{{id}}`
    
- **Authentication**: Requires `VtexIdclientAutCookie` in the headers.
    
- **HTTP Headers**: Accept `application/json` / Content-Type `application/json`
    
- **Permissions**: The user or application key must have the `ViewPayments` [License Manager resource](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
    

Retrieves data for a specific token by its ID (unique identifier automatically generated during token creation).

### Path parameter

| Parameter | Required | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| id | Yes | string | Token ID (unique identifier automatically generated during token creation and stored in the system). |

## Response

### Successful response

- Status Code: `200 OK` - Returns a card token object.
    
- Body:
    

``` json
{
  "id": "string",
  "providerId": "string",
  "orderGroup": "string",
  "profileId": "string",
  "shopperId": "string",
  "email": "string",
  "card": {
    "paymentSystemId": "string",
    "paymentSystemName": "string",
    "firstDigits": "000000",
    "lastDigits": "0000",
    "address": {
      "addressType": "string",
      "addressId": "string",
      "postalCode": "string",
      "street": "string",
      "neighborhood": "string",
      "city": "string",
      "state": "string",
      "country": "string",
      "number": "string",
      "complement": "string"
    },
    "holderName": "string"
  },
  "cardTokenData": {
    "type": "string",
    "value": "string",
    "expiration": "YYYY-MM",
    "label": "string",
    "providerCardTokenId": "string",
    "useCvvForAuthorization": "boolean",
    "href": "string"
  },
  "extraData": {
    "string": "string"
  }
}

 ```

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | string | Token ID (unique identifier automatically generated during token creation and stored in the system). |
| providerId | string | Name of the connector's owner account (`accountName`) used to create the token. |
| orderGroup | string | Order group ID, a segment of the order ID that groups all orders related to the same purchase. For example, in the order ID `v71021570str-02`, the order group ID is `v71021570str`. |
| profileId | string | Profile ID in the Profile System (used for contract identification). |
| shopperId | string | Shopper identification. |
| email | string | Email is used only if neither `profileId` nor `orderGroup` are provided (rare use). |
| card | object | Card object. |
| card.paymentSystemId | string | Payment system ID in the Payment Gateway. |
| card.paymentSystemName | string | Card brand, e.g. Visa, Mastercard. |
| card.firstDigits | string | Card BIN (first six digits). |
| card.lastDigits | string | The last four digits of the card. |
| card.address | object | Card address object. |
| card.address.addressType | string | Address type. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`. |
| card.address.addressId | string | Address identifier. |
| card.address.postalCode | string | Postal code (ZIP/CEP). |
| card.address.street | string | Street name. |
| card.address.neighborhood | string | Neighborhood name. |
| card.address.city | string | City name. |
| card.address.state | string | State name. |
| card.address.country | string | Country name. |
| card.address.number | string | Street number. |
| card.address.complement | string | Address complement (e.g., apartment, building). |
| card.holderName | string | Name of the cardholder as printed on the card. |
| cardTokenData | object | Card token data object. |
| cardTokenData.type | string | Type of token (e.g., FILE, TOKEN_CLIENT_ID, TOKEN_VALUE). |
| cardTokenData.value | string | The token value to be used in transactions. |
| cardTokenData.expiration | string | Token expiration date in `YYYY-MM` format. |
| cardTokenData.label | string | Token alias (an alternative name to simplify token identification). |
| cardTokenData.providerCardTokenId | string | Client ID used to retrieve the token from the provider. |
| cardTokenData.useCvvForAuthorization | boolean | Flag indicating if CVV is required (`true`) or not (`false`). |
| cardTokenData.href | string | URL of the token file stored by the provider. |
| extraData | object | Dictionary for additional data. |

#### Unsuccessful responses

| HTTP Status Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| 400 | Invalid request data. |
| 401 | Invalid or unauthorized auth headers. |
| 403 | Missing auth headers. |
| 404 | Token not previously registered. |
| 500 | Internal server error – unexpected issue on the server. Retry after a short delay or contact support if the problem persists. |

body.raw:
{
   "providerId":"string",
   "profileId":"string optional if email or orderGroup exists",
   "email": "string optional if profileId or orderGroup exists",
   "orderGroup": "string optional if profileId or email exists",
   "card":{
      "paymentSystemName":"string",
      "paymentSystemId":"string optional",
      "firstDigits":"string",
      "lastDigits":"string",
      "address":{
         "addressType":"string",
         "addressId":"string",
         "postalCode":"string",
         "street":"string",
         "neighborhood":"string",
         "city":"string",
         "state":"string",
         "country":"string",
         "number":"string",
         "complement":"string"
      },
      "holderName":"string"
   },
   "cardTokenData":{
      "type":"string",
      "value":"string required if type is TOKEN_VALUE",
      "expiration":"string",
      "label":"string optional",
      "href":"string required if type is FILE",
      "providerCardTokenId":"string required if type is TOKEN_CLIENT_ID",
      "useCvvForAuthorization": false // boolean optional default false
   },
   "extraData":{
      "additionalProp1":"string",
      "additionalProp2":"string",
      "additionalProp3":"string"
   }
}

request.description:
## Request

- **Method**: `POST`
    
- **URL**: `{{accountName}}.vtexcommercestable.com.br/api/card-token-vault/tokens`
    
- **Authentication**: Requires `VtexIdclientAutCookie` in the headers.
    
- **HTTP Headers**: Accept `application/json` / Content-Type `application/json`
    
- **Permissions**: The user or application key must have the `CreateCardTokens` [License Manager resource](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
    

Registers a new card token in the system.

### Request body

``` json
{
   "providerId": "string",
   "profileId": "string optional if email or orderGroup exists",
   "shopperId": "string optional, mandatory only if a personal card is used",
   "email": "string optional if profileId or orderGroup exists",
   "orderGroup": "string optional if profileId or email exists",
   "card":{
      "paymentSystemName": "string",
      "paymentSystemId": "string optional",
      "firstDigits": "string",
      "lastDigits": "string",
      "address":{
         "addressType": "string",
         "addressId": "string",
         "postalCode": "string",
         "street": "string",
         "neighborhood": "string",
         "city": "string",
         "state": "string",
         "country": "string",
         "number": "string",
         "complement": "string"
      },
      "holderName": "string"
   },
   "cardTokenData":{
      "type": "string",
      "value": "string required if type is TOKEN_VALUE",
      "expiration": "string",
      "label": "string optional",
      "href": "string required if type is FILE",
      "providerCardTokenId": "string required if type is TOKEN_CLIENT_ID",
      "useCvvForAuthorization": "boolean optional, default false"
   },
   "extraData":{
      "additionalProp1": "string",
      "additionalProp2": "string",
      "additionalProp3": "string"
   }
}

 ```

| Field | Required | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| providerId | Yes | string | Name of the connector's owner account (`accountName`) used to create the token. |
| profileId | No | string | Profile ID in the Profile System (used for contract identification). This field is optional if `email` or `orderGroup` exists. |
| shopperId | No | string | Shopper identification. This field is optional and only applicable if a personal card is used. |
| email | No | string | Email is used only if neither `profileId` nor `orderGroup` are provided (rare use). |
| orderGroup | No | string | Order group ID, a segment of the order ID that groups all orders related to the same purchase. For example, in the order ID `v71021570str-02`, the order group ID is `v71021570str`. This field is optional if `email` or `profileId` exists. |
| card | yes | object | Card object. |
| card.paymentSystemId | No | string | Payment system ID in the Payment Gateway. |
| card.paymentSystemName | Yes | string | Card brand, e.g. Visa, Mastercard. |
| card.firstDigits | Yes | string | Card BIN (first six digits). |
| card.lastDigits | Yes | string | The last four digits of the card. |
| card.address | No | object | Card address object. |
| card.address.addressType | No | string | Address type. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`. |
| card.address.addressId | No | string | Address identifier. |
| card.address.postalCode | No | string | Postal code (ZIP/CEP). |
| card.address.street | No | string | Street name. |
| card.address.neighborhood | No | string | Neighborhood name. |
| card.address.city | No | string | City name. |
| card.address.state | No | string | State name. |
| card.address.country | No | string | Country name. |
| card.address.number | No | string | Street number. |
| card.address.complement | No | string | Address complement (e.g., apartment, building). |
| card.holderName | No | string | Name of the cardholder as printed on the card. |
| cardTokenData | Yes | object | Card token data object. |
| cardTokenData.type | Yes | string | Type of token (e.g., FILE, TOKEN_CLIENT_ID, TOKEN_VALUE). |
| cardTokenData.value | No | string | The token value to be used in transactions. This field is required if the `type` is TOKEN_VALUE. |
| cardTokenData.expiration | Yes | string | Token expiration date in `YYYY-MM` format. |
| cardTokenData.label | No | string | Token alias (an alternative name to simplify token identification). |
| cardTokenData.href | No | string | URL of the token file stored by the provider. This field is required if the `type` is FILE. |
| cardTokenData.providerCardTokenId | No | string | Client ID used to retrieve the token from the provider. This field is required if the `type` is TOKEN_CLIENT_ID. |
| cardTokenData.useCvvForAuthorization | No | boolean | Flag indicating if CVV is required (`true`) or not (`false`). Default: `false`. |
| extraData | No | object | Dictionary for additional data. |

### Response

#### Successful response

- Status Code: `201 Created` - token saved.
    
- Body: No content.
    

#### Unsuccessful responses

| HTTP Status Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| 400 | Problem validating request data. |
| 401 | Invalid or unauthorized auth headers. |
| 403 | Missing auth headers. |
| 409 | Token already exists. |
| 500 | Internal server error – unexpected issue on the server. Retry after a short delay or contact support if the problem persists. |

## Request

- **Method**: `PUT`
    
- **URL**: `{{accountName}}.vtexcommercestable.com.br/api/card-token-vault/tokens/{{id}}`
    
- **Authentication**: Requires `VtexIdclientAutCookie` in the headers.
    
- **HTTP Headers**: Accept `application/json` / Content-Type `application/json`
    
- **Permissions**: The user or application key must have the `ManageCardTokens` [License Manager resource](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
    

Updates data for an existing token.

This endpoint requires sending the complete request body from the **Create Card Token** endpoint, except for the `card` object.

### Path parameter

| Parameter | Required | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| id | Yes | string | Token ID (unique identifier automatically generated during token creation and stored in the system). |

### Request body

``` json
{
   "providerId":"string",
   "profileId": "string optional if email or orderGroup exists",
   "shopperId": "string optional, mandatory only if a personal card is used",
   "email": "string optional if profileId or orderGroup exists",
   "orderGroup": "string optional if profileId or email exists",
   "cardTokenData":{
      "type": "string",
      "value": "string required if type is TOKEN_VALUE",
      "expiration": "string",
      "label": "string optional",
      "href": "string required if type is FILE",
      "providerCardTokenId": "string required if type is TOKEN_CLIENT_ID",
      "useCvvForAuthorization": "boolean optional, default false"
   },
   "extraData":{
      "additionalProp1": "string",
      "additionalProp2": "string",
      "additionalProp3": "string"
   }
}

 ```

| Field | Required | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| providerId | Yes | string | Name of the owner account of the connector used to create the token. |
| profileId | No | string | Profile ID in the Profile System. This field is optional if `email` or `orderGroup` exists. |
| shopperId | No | string | Shopper identification. This field is optional and only applicable if a personal card is used. |
| email | No | string | Email is used only if neither `profileId` nor `orderGroup` are provided (rare use). |
| orderGroup | No | string | Order group ID, a segment of the order ID that groups all orders related to the same purchase. For example, in the order ID `v71021570str-02`, the order group ID is `v71021570str`. This field is optional if `email` or `profileId` exists. |
| cardTokenData | Yes | object | Card token data object. |
| cardTokenData.type | Yes | string | Type of token (e.g., FILE, TOKEN_CLIENT_ID, TOKEN_VALUE). |
| cardTokenData.value | No | string | The token value to be used in transactions. This field is required if the `type` is TOKEN_VALUE. |
| cardTokenData.expiration | Yes | string | Token expiration date in `YYYY-MM` format. |
| cardTokenData.label | No | string | Token alias (an alternative name to simplify token identification). |
| cardTokenData.href | No | string | URL of the token file stored by the provider. This field is required if the `type` is FILE. |
| cardTokenData.providerCardTokenId | No | string | Client ID used to retrieve the token from the provider. This field is required if the `type` is TOKEN_CLIENT_ID. |
| cardTokenData.useCvvForAuthorization | No | boolean | Flag indicating if CVV is required (`true`) or not (`false`). Default: `false`. |
| extraData | No | object | Dictionary for additional data. |

### Response

#### Successful response

- Status Code: `201 Created` - token saved.
    
- Body: No content.
    

#### Unsuccessful responses

| HTTP Status Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| 400 | Problem validating request data. |
| 401 | Invalid or unauthorized auth headers. |
| 403 | Missing auth headers. |
| 404 | Token not previously registered. |
| 500 | Internal server error – unexpected issue on the server. Retry after a short delay or contact support if the problem persists. |

## Request

- **Method**: `DELETE`
    
- **URL**: `{{accountName}}.vtexcommercestable.com.br/api/payments/pvt/accounts/{{id}}`
    
- **Authentication**: Requires `VtexIdclientAutCookie` in the headers.
    
- **HTTP Headers**: Accept `application/json` / Content-Type `application/json`
    
- **Permissions**: The user or application key must have the `MakePayments` [License Manager resource](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
    

Deletes a token from the system.

This endpoint doesn’t require a request body.

### Path parameter

| Parameter | Required | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| id | Yes | string | Token ID (unique identifier automatically generated during token creation and stored in the system). |

## Response

### Successful response

- Status Code: `200 OK` - token deleted.
    
- Body: No content.
    

### Unsuccessful responses

| HTTP Status Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| 401 | Invalid or unauthorized auth headers. |
| 403 | Missing auth headers. |
| 404 | Token not previously registered. |
| 500 | Internal server error – unexpected issue on the server. Retry after a short delay or contact support if the problem persists. |

## Request

- **Method**: `POST`
    
- **URL**: `{{accountName}}.vtexcommercestable.com.br/api/card-token-vault/tokens/import`
    
- **Authentication**: Requires `VtexIdclientAutCookie` in the headers.
    
- **HTTP Headers**: Accept `application/json` / Content-Type `multipart/form-data`
    
- **Permissions**: The user or application key must have the `ImportCardToken` [License Manager resource](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
    

Imports tokens in bulk via an XLSX file. Note that:

- **File size and type:** Only XLSX files with a maximum size of 20MB are allowed.
    
- **Simultaneous imports:** Each account can only trigger one import at a time. If an import is in progress, you need to wait for it to finish to trigger another import.
    
- **Auditing:** All import actions are audited.
    

### Request body

```
'file=@"/C:/test/test.xlsx"'

 ```

The body of the request will contain your XLSX file, which you'll send as a form data part.

The XLSX file must have the first row with the following headers:

``` json
accountName,providerId,profileId,paymentSystemName,cardFirstDigits,cardLastDigits,cardAddressType,cardAddressPostalCode,cardAddressStreet,cardAddressNeighborhood,cardAddressCity,cardAddressState,cardAddressCountry,cardAddressNumber,cardAddressComplement,cardHolderName,tokenType,tokenValue,tokenExpiration,tokenLabel,tokenProviderCardTokenId,tokenUseCvvForAuthorization,tokenHref,extraData,email,shopperId

 ```

The `extraData` field should contain a JSON with a dictionary of additional data, or an empty JSON.

## Response

### Successful response

- Status Code: `202 Accepted` - File received.
    
- Body: Returns an import the Token ID in the system, which can be used to retrieve the import status and the report from the import.
    

``` json
{
"id": "string"
}

 ```

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | string | Import ID. |

### Unsuccessful responses

| HTTP Status Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| 400 | Incorrect `Content-Type` or invalid file type. |
| 401 | Invalid or unauthorized auth headers. |
| 403 | Missing auth headers. |
| 500 | Internal server error – unexpected issue on the server. Retry after a short delay or contact support if the problem persists. |

## Request

- **Method**: `GET`
    
- **URL**: `{{accountName}}.vtexcommercestable.com.br/api/card-token-vault/tokens/import/{{importId}}`
    
- **Authentication**: Requires `VtexIdclientAutCookie` in the headers.
    
- **HTTP Headers**: Accept `application/json` / Content-Type `application/json`
    
- **Permissions**: The user or application key must have the `GetImportCardTokenStatus` [License Manager resource](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
    

Returns the status and progress percentage of an import.

### Path parameter

| Parameter | Required | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| importId | Yes | string | Import ID. |

## Response

### Successful response

- Status Code: `200 OK` - import data obtained.
    
- Body: Returns the import status.
    

``` json
{
    "status": "RUNNING",
    "id": "string",
    "completionPercentage":"integer",
    "createdDate": "string","
    "updatedDate": "string",
    "reportUrl":"string optional if the import process had any error"
}

 ```

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | string | Response status, which can be: `DONE`, `RUNNING`, `CREATED` or `FAILED`. |
| id | string | Import ID. |
| completionPercentage | integer | Importing completion percentage. |
| createdDate | string | Creation date. |
| updatedDate | string | Last update date. |
| reportUrl | string | Report URL. This field is optional if the import process had an error. |

### Unsuccessful responses

| HTTP Status Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| 401 | Invalid or unauthorized auth headers. |
| 403 | Missing auth headers. |
| 404 | Import not found. |
| 500 | Internal server error – unexpected issue on the server. Retry after a short delay or contact support if the problem persists. |

## Request

- **Method**: `GET`
    
- **URL**: `{{accountName}}.vtexcommercestable.com.br/api/card-token-vault/tokens/import/{{importId}}/report`
    
- **Authentication**: Requires `VtexIdclientAutCookie` in the headers.
    
- **HTTP Headers**: Accept `application/json` / Content-Type `application/json`
    
- **Permissions**: The user or application key must have the `GetImportCardTokensReport` [License Manager resource](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
    

Returns the import report, indicating lines with issues.

### Path parameter

| Parameter | Required | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| importId | Yes | string | Import ID. |

## Response

### Successful response

- Status Code: `302 Found` - redirects the user to the report download URL.
    

### Unsuccessful responses

| HTTP Status Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| 401 | Invalid or unauthorized auth headers. |
| 403 | Missing auth headers. |
| 404 | Import not found. |
| 500 | Internal server error – unexpected issue on the server. Retry after a short delay or contact support if the problem persists. |

description:
The Card Token Vault API is responsible for creating and updating card tokens, as well as supporting bulk imports. Card tokens are unique identifiers that represent securely stored credit card data. The Payment Gateway API enables the retrieval and deletion of card tokens.

> ℹ️ This API's endpoints can be used for personal cards (cards associated with a single buyer) and shared cards (cards used by more than one person and associated with a specific contract). However, in a scenario of operations with personal cards, the `shopperId` must be additionally sent in the [Created Card Token](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/2352637/2sAYkKGcHD#7fe79cbd-2f5b-420b-9993-f4b4af8265d1) or [Update Card Token](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/2352637/2sAYkKGcHD#cba5b948-a4ad-4eb8-8659-7c32a3bd232b) endpoints.
